```{=html}
<script>
(function() {
  function init() {
    var container = document.getElementById('paper-network-3d');
    if (!container) {
      console.error('paper-network-3d not found');
      return;
    }
    console.log('Container found, creating 3D scene...');
    
    // åˆ›å»º 3D åœºæ™¯
    var scene = document.createElement('div');
    scene.className = 'bubble-scene';
    container.appendChild(scene);
    
    // ä¸­å¿ƒèŠ‚ç‚¹
    var centerBubble = document.createElement('div');
    centerBubble.className = 'center-bubble';
    centerBubble.innerHTML = 'ğŸ§ ';
    scene.appendChild(centerBubble);
    
    // æ”¶é›†è®ºæ–‡æ•°æ®
    var papers = [];
    var links = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="posts/papers"]');
    links.forEach(function(link) {
      var text = link.textContent.trim();
      if (text && text.length > 3 && !link.closest('#paper-network-3d')) {
        var exists = papers.some(function(p) { return p.url === link.href; });
        if (!exists) {
          papers.push({ title: text, url: link.href });
        }
      }
    });
    
    console.log('Found papers:', papers.length);
    
    // æ›´æ–°ç»Ÿè®¡
    var paperCountEl = document.getElementById('paper-count');
    if (paperCountEl) paperCountEl.textContent = papers.length || '0';
    
    var categoryCountEl = document.getElementById('category-count');
    if (categoryCountEl) categoryCountEl.textContent = papers.length > 0 ? '1' : '0';
    
    // ç”Ÿæˆæ°”æ³¡
    if (papers.length === 0) {
      papers.push({ title: 'æš‚æ— è®ºæ–‡', url: '#' });
    }
    
    var radius = 100;
    var total = papers.length;
    
    papers.forEach(function(paper, i) {
      var bubble = document.createElement('a');
      bubble.className = 'paper-bubble';
      bubble.href = paper.url;
      bubble.title = paper.title;
      
      var phi = Math.acos(-1 + (2 * i + 1) / total);
      var theta = Math.sqrt(total * Math.PI) * phi;
      
      var x = radius * Math.cos(theta) * Math.sin(phi);
      var y = radius * Math.sin(theta) * Math.sin(phi);
      var z = radius * Math.cos(phi);
      
      bubble.style.cssText = '--x:' + x + 'px; --y:' + y + 'px; --z:' + z + 'px;';
      
      var shortTitle = paper.title.length > 12 ? paper.title.substring(0, 12) + '...' : paper.title;
      bubble.innerHTML = '<span class="bubble-dot"></span><span class="bubble-label">' + shortTitle + '</span>';
      
      scene.appendChild(bubble);
    });
    
    // é¼ æ ‡è·Ÿéš
    var rotateX = 0, rotateY = 0;
    var targetRotateX = 0, targetRotateY = 0;
    
    container.onmousemove = function(e) {
      var rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();
      targetRotateY = ((e.clientX - rect.left - rect.width/2) / rect.width) * 25;
      targetRotateX = -((e.clientY - rect.top - rect.height/2) / rect.height) * 25;
    };
    
    container.onmouseleave = function() {
      targetRotateX = 0;
      targetRotateY = 0;
    };
    
    function animate() {
      rotateX += (targetRotateX - rotateX) * 0.08;
      rotateY += (targetRotateY - rotateY) * 0.08;
      scene.style.transform = 'rotateX(' + rotateX + 'deg) rotateY(' + rotateY + 'deg)';
      requestAnimationFrame(animate);
    }
    animate();
    
    console.log('3D scene created successfully');
  }
  
  if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
    setTimeout(init, 100);
  } else {
    window.addEventListener('load', function() { setTimeout(init, 100); });
  }
})();
</script>
```
